message.body: So we graduate tomorrow. Das cray.
I Wish i knew sad songs on the harmonica so i could play them
Play them graduation blues. My grandma is coming to the ceremony and it's also her birthday! She's 76 omg
Really? I saw someone but it didn't look like your grandma... Your dad was really nice i miss that guy

Yeah she was probably standing next to him, but she remembered you. I saw your parents tonight, they were really nice too. Hopefully we will see a lot of each others parents this summer when we hang out erry daiiii
Ayyy i'm with it when are you leaving for atlanta?
Ooo soap then we got mad time. Vacationing over the summer?
I have like two trips planned that are about three days each, so not really lol. How bout you? Toronto?
Yeah going there like next week, and hopefully some other places spread out over the summer. Looking for a JOB thats what i need
Oh word, have fun! Yeah I gave up trying to find a job lmao, but good luck! Im just chillin this summer. Anything from the met?
Yo I'm not gonna be at home for the Spain Portugal game. Keep me updated!
